entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 3 except minus 8 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
